## WorkerTilerProtocol.UpdateIndexRequest interface

This object is sent to the tiler to register a new tile index in the worker.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface UpdateIndexRequest extends WorkerServiceProtocol.ServiceRequest 
```
